backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, credit balances, admin authorization, BTC transfer requests, and blockchain deposit verification.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and test IDs for verifying allowlisted admin login flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files, their roles, and UI/auth logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and auth gate handling Internet Identity login, admin checks, redirects, and initial admin credit assignment.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Full‑screen loader showing admin verification progress with retry and sign‑out actions after delay.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Card shown to non‑admins providing principal info, admin check retry, and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and clearing caches on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name using a query mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, user info, admin link handling, mobile menu, and login/logout button based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, and content area including an admin troubleshooting card.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Shows a table of transactions with formatted metadata, type badges, actions, and a dialog trigger for verifying transfers.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Modal for verifying a BTC transfer by submitting a blockchain transaction ID and showing request status details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile, balance, admin status, and other backend actions with caching and mutation handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus shared UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
Displays verified admin info including principal, balance, and admin capabilities with navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for transferring credits, sending BTC, viewing transaction history, and managing principal validation.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Lets users submit Bitcoin transaction IDs to purchase credits and view their current balance.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user balance, transaction stats, recent activity, and quick actions like buying credits or sending BTC.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays transaction history, computes credit/debit totals, and shows a table of all transactions with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Provides a form to send BTC including balance display, fee estimation, validation, and transfer submission.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Implements localStorage- and session-based caching of per-principal admin status with TTL and in-memory tracking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning values from hash routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, issues, and architectural notes for the BTC credit and transfer system.
